tour_name: Botswana and South Africa Luxury Honeymoon

locations.name: Okavango Delta
locations.description: UNESCO World Heritage site known for its unique inland delta ecosystem, mokoro excursions, and remote wildlife viewing.

locations.name: Chobe National Park
locations.description: Famous for its massive elephant herds, especially along the Chobe River, offering spectacular sunset cruises.

locations.name: Cape Town
locations.description: Iconic South African city nestled beneath Table Mountain, offering a blend of vibrant culture, history, and stunning natural beauty.

locations.name: Cape Winelands
locations.description: Picturesque region near Cape Town known for its charming towns (like Stellenbosch or Franschhoek), rolling vineyards, mountain scenery, world-class wines, and gourmet cuisine.
